resources.string: WordWiz is a word game, it uses nouns, adverbs,adjectives etc. The more you advance in the game the more the conquest is enjoyable. WordWiz has 3 levels. In each level there are words whose letters have been shuffled or rearranged, its upon you to use the provided letters to come up with a correct English word and ensure you use all the letters provided e.g Shuffled word is: laim Correct word is: mail. Lets meet in the conquest and hope you have fun! For any request contact deetech at deetechapps@gmail.com
